alert.note: Alert for Darke; Miami; Shelby (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 25 at 11:13AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHWESTERN SHELBY, SOUTHEASTERN DARKE AND NORTHERN MIAMI COUNTIES THROUGH 1145 AM EDT... At 1112 AM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located near Arcanum, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Troy, Sidney, Piqua, Greenville, Versailles, Covington, Arcanum, Bradford, Pleasant Hill, Hardin, Webster, Russia, Gettysburg, Laura, Fletcher, Pitsburg, Lockington, Union Corners, Polo and Newbern. This includes I-75 in Ohio between mile markers 75 and 90. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
